metadata.title: CVE-2016-2175 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache PDFBox before 1.8.12 and 2.x before 2.0.1 does not properlyinitialize the XML parsers, which allows context-dependent attackers toconduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted PDF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.12-1').
